setAttribute

public static void setAttribute(org.dom4j.Element element,
                                String attributeName,
                                char delimiter,
                                char nameValueSeparator,
                                Map<String,String> values)
Useful to set the value of attributes that are composed of a map of attributes name and value pairs. The delimiter character appears between name and value pairs. The nameValueSeparator character appears between the name and its value.

Parameters:

attributeName -
delimiter -
